span.a: Check out this page for a list of virtual tours you and your family can take from home, including Museums, Natural Parks and Historic sites.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

a.strong: Inexpensive STEM Activities for around the house

span.a: Check out these fun STEM activities you can do from home, from mindSpark.

a.strong: Also Check out free issues of STEM Magazine

div.p: And Discover Space from home with Discoveryspace.org

span.a: Just For Kids: A Comic Exploring The New Coronavirus

span.span: Digital 5 a day | Children's Commissioner for England
Easy to follow, practical steps for children and parents to achieve a healthy and balanced digital diet

span.a: Digital 5 A Day Simple steps to a balanced digital diet and better wellbeing Powerpoint

span.span: Coping and Staying Emotionally Well During COVID-19-related School Closures - Active Minds
Tips for staying well and coping through the stressful period of COVID-19 related school closures and remote study or work.
COVID-19: What Parents Need to Know - Stanford Children’s Health Blog
Stanford Children’s Health pediatrician Anita Juvvadi, MD, addresses some of the most common questions she is hearing from parents about COVID-19.
